_meanings:
{@--1@} Falling down or away, a
fall; {#atyArUQirBavati mahatAmapyapaBraMSanizWA#}
<ls>Ś. 4</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> ending in a (precipitate)
fall.

{@--2@} A corrupted word, 
corruption; {#Gara#} is an {#apaBraMSa#} or corruption
of {#gfha#}; (hence) an incorrect word
whether formed against the rules of
grammar or used in a sense not
strictly Sanskrit; see {#apaSabda#}.

{@--3@} A
corrupt language, one of the lowest
forms of the Prākṛta dialect used by
cow-herds &c. (in kāvyas); (in 
Śāstras) any language other than 
Sanskrit; {#ABIrAdigiraH kAvyezvapaBraMSa iti smftAH .#}
{#SAstrezu saMskftAdanyadapaBraMSatayoditam ..#} <ls>Kāv. 1.</ls>
